name: envinfo
description: Info about your dev environment for debugging purposes

scripts.postcompress: tar -czvf envinfo-linux.tar.gz envinfo-linux && tar -czvf envinfo-macos.tar.gz envinfo-macos && zip -r -X envinfo-win.zip envinfo-win.exe
scripts.preversion: npm run test && webpack && git add .
scripts.postversion: npm run executable && npm run compress && npm run release
scripts.test: jest --env=node && npm run lint && npm run check:format
